<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Perfect Clarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=175) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 93 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
You fail or critically fail an attack roll or Will save.

</column>

---

You burn out all of your rage to ensure that your attack lands and your mind remains free. Reroll the triggering attack roll or Will save with a +2 circumstance bonus, use the better result, and resolve the effect. You then immediately stop raging.
name: Perfect Clarity
